subject: Ordering pedals
description_text:
Hey,
im planning to order some pedals from your site simpson.com,
but im worried about safety/getting scammed out of my money,
dont see a lot of reviews about the site/people ordering from there.
can you reassure me in any way? if things go wrong will i get my money back?
thank you,
K

conversations.body_text: 你好，Kristers Pulle       Hello, please feel free to purchase. We will not cheat you out of your money. We have many customers and we are trustworthy.
